def count_equal_pairs_excluding_k(N, A):
    c = collections.Counter(A)
    total_pairs = sum((i * (i - 1) // 2 for i in c.values()))
    result = []
    for i in range(N):
        pairs_excluding_k = total_pairs + (c[A[i]] - 1)
        result.append(pairs_excluding_k)
    return result
